field.statelessProgrammableSwitchProgrammableS: Stateless programmable switch programmable switch event

help.serviceIndex: Unique numerical identifier assigned to distinguish individual, similar services (like valves or buttons) when they are grouped together within a single complex HomeKit accessory
help.asLinkedAccessory: Link two or more HomeKit accessories together as a single device.
help.currentHeaterCoolerState: Current heater cooler state: INACTIVE(0), IDLE(1), HEATING(2), COOLING(3)
help.targetHeaterCoolerState: Target heater cooler state: AUTO(0), HEAT(1), COOL(2)
help.currentDoorState: Current door state: OPEN(0), CLOSED(1),  OPENING(2),  CLOSING(3),  STOPPED(4)
help.configurationTimer: If set, use programmatically duration timer
help.inverted: Inverts the open/close state for devices like window coverings. If true, 0% means open and 100% means closed. Default is false.
help.targetPosition: The desired position of a window covering, door, or window. 0% is typically closed, 100% is open.
help.currentPosition: The current position of a window covering, door, or window. 0% is typically closed, 100% is open.
help.positionState: The current movement state of a window covering, door, or window. DECREASING(0), INCREASING(1), STOPPED(2)
help.mute: The mute state of a device like a speaker or television. True for muted, false for unmuted.
help.statelessProgrammableSwitch: The event type for a stateless programmable switch. Typically: 0 for single press, 1 for double press, 2 for long press.
help.currentTemperature: The current ambient temperature in Celsius.
help.currentHeatingCoolingState: The current operational state of the heating or cooling system. Typically: 0 for Off, 1 for Heat, 2 for Cool.
help.inuseStatus: Indicates if the device or service (e.g., valve, outlet) is currently in use. Typically: 0 for not in use, 1 for in use.
help.currentAirPurifierState: The current operational state of the air purifier. Typically: 0 for Inactive, 1 for Idle, 2 for Purifying Air.
help.targetAirPurifierState: The desired operational state for the air purifier. Typically: 0 for Manual, 1 for Auto.
help.currentHumidifierDehumidifierState: The current state of the humidifier or dehumidifier. INACTIVE(0), IDLE(1), HUMIDIFYING(2), DEHUMIDIFYING(3)
help.targetHumidifierDehumidifierState: The target state for the humidifier or dehumidifier. AUTO(0), HUMIDIFIER(1), DEHUMIDIFIER(2)
help.activeIdentifier: The identifier of the currently active input source for a television or similar device.
help.targetTemperature: The desired target temperature in Celsius for a thermostat or heater/cooler.
help.valveType: The type of valve. Typically: 0 for Generic Valve, 1 for Irrigation, 2 for Shower Head, 3 for Water Faucet.
help.batteryLowThreshold: Defines the percentage threshold at which the battery is considered low. Default is 20%.
help.airPurifierSwingMode: Controls the swing or oscillation mode of an air purifier. Typically: 0 for Swing Disabled, 1 for Swing Enabled.
help.ozoneDensity: The current ozone density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.nitrogenDioxideDensity: The current nitrogen dioxide density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.sulphurDioxideDensity: The current sulphur dioxide density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.pm25Density: The current PM2.5 particulate matter density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.pm10Density: The current PM10 particulate matter density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.vocDensity: The current Volatile Organic Compound density in micrograms per cubic meter.
help.carbonDioxideLevel: The current carbon dioxide level in parts per million (ppm).
help.carbonDioxidePeakLevel: The peak carbon dioxide level detected, in parts per million (ppm).
help.carbonMonoxideLevel: The current carbon monoxide level in parts per million (ppm).
help.carbonMonoxidePeakLevel: The peak carbon monoxide level detected, in parts per million (ppm).
help.obstructionDetected: Indicates if an obstruction is detected for a window covering, door, or garage door. True if obstructed.
help.filterLifeLevel: The remaining life of a filter, in percentage.
help.filterResetIndication: Indicates if a filter change is needed or if the maintenance indicator should be reset. Set to true to trigger a reset.
help.lockCurrentStateGarage: The current lock state specifically for a garage door opener. UNSECURED(0), SECURED(1), JAMMED(2), UNKNOWN(3)
help.lockTargetStateGarage: The desired lock state specifically for a garage door opener. UNSECURED(0), SECURED(1)
help.coolingThresholdTemperature: The temperature in Celsius at which cooling will start in Auto mode.
help.heatingThresholdTemperature: The temperature in Celsius at which heating will start in Auto mode.
help.currentRelativeHumidity: The current relative humidity in percentage.
help.targetRelativeHumidity: The desired target relative humidity in percentage for a humidifier or dehumidifier.
help.relativeHumidityDehumidifierThreshold: The humidity percentage above which the dehumidifier will activate.
help.relativeHumidityHumidifierThreshold: The humidity percentage below which the humidifier will activate.
help.waterLevel: The current water level, typically as a percentage.
help.remainingDuration: The time remaining in seconds for an active program or operation (e.g., for a valve or irrigation system).
help.setDuration: Sets the duration in seconds for a program or operation (e.g., for a valve or irrigation system).
help.securitySystemAlarmType: The type of alarm triggered by a security system. Refer to HomeKit documentation for specific values.
help.slatType: The type of slats for a window covering. Typically: 0 for Horizontal, 1 for Vertical.
help.currentTiltAngle: The current tilt angle of slats on a window covering, in degrees.
help.targetTiltAngle: The desired tilt angle of slats on a window covering, in degrees.
help.volume: The current volume level, typically as a percentage (0-100).
help.configuredName: The user-configured name for a service or accessory.
help.inputDeviceType: The type of input device (e.g., for a TV). Values like HDMI, TUNER etc.
help.inputSourceType: The type of input source (e.g., for a TV). Values like HDMI, TUNER etc.
help.sleepDiscoveryMode: For TVs, indicates discoverability. 0 for Not Discoverable, 1 for Always Discoverable.
help.remoteKey: Simulates a remote control key press for a TV or set-top box. Values correspond to specific remote functions.
help.powerModeSelection: Allows setting the power mode for a device like a TV (e.g., turn on/off screen).
help.closedCaptions: Indicates if closed captions are enabled. 0 for Disabled, 1 for Enabled.
help.volumeControlType: Indicates the type of volume control available. 0 for None, 1 for Relative, 2 for Absolute, 3 for Relative with current.
help.volumeSelector: Used to send relative volume changes (increment/decrement).
help.pictureMode: The current picture mode for a television (e.g., Standard, Cinema, Game).
help.targetVisibilityState: The target visibility state for a camera's indicator light or similar. SHOWN(0), HIDDEN(1)
help.currentRelativeHumidityThermo: The current relative humidity measured by the thermostat, in percentage.
help.currentHeatingCoolingStateForThermostat: The current operational state of heating or cooling system specifically for a thermostat. Typically: 0 for Off, 1 for Heat, 2 for Cool, 3 for Auto.
help.isConfigured: Indicates if a service has been configured. 0 for Not Configured, 1 for Configured.
help.serviceLabelIndex: A numerical index for a service label, used to differentiate multiple services of the same type.
help.windowHoldPosition: A boolean. If true, the window covering will hold its current position when movement is stopped.
help.currentHorizontalTiltAngle: The current horizontal tilt angle of slats or a similar mechanism, in degrees.
help.targetHorizontalTiltAngle: The desired horizontal tilt angle of slats or a similar mechanism, in degrees.
help.currentVerticalTiltAngle: The current vertical tilt angle of slats or a similar mechanism, in degrees.
help.targetVerticalTiltAngle: The desired vertical tilt angle of slats or a similar mechanism, in degrees.
help.faultStatus: Indicates a general fault status. Typically 0 for No Fault, 1 for General Fault.
help.statusTampered: Indicates if the accessory has been tampered with. Typically 0 for Not Tampered, 1 for Tampered.
help.statusFault: Indicates a specific fault condition. Typically 0 for No Fault, 1 for Fault detected.
help.statusLowBattery: Indicates a low battery condition. Typically 0 for Battery Normal, 1 for Battery Low.
help.detectedState: Generic detection state for sensors like motion or contact. Typically 0 for Not Detected, 1 for Detected.
help.lockPhysicalControls: Controls whether physical controls on the device are locked or unlocked. 0 for Unlocked, 1 for Locked.
help.rotationSpeed: The rotation speed of a fan, typically as a percentage.
help.combinedColor: Combined(RGB) color. Maybe used instead of hue/saturation/brightness
help.colorTemperature: The color temperature of a light, in Mireds (Reciprocal Megakelvin). Value range typically 50-400.
help.saturation: The saturation of a color light, as a percentage (0-100).
help.hue: The hue of a color light, in degrees (0-360).
help.brightness: The brightness of a light, as a percentage (0-100).
help.fanSwingMode: The swing or oscillation mode of the fan. Typically: 0 for Swing Disabled, 1 for Swing Enabled.
help.targetFanState: The desired state of the fan. Typically: 0 for Manual (use rotation speed), 1 for Auto.
help.rotationDirection: The rotation direction of a fan. Typically: 0 for Clockwise, 1 for Counter-Clockwise.
help.currentFanState: The current operational state of the fan. Typically: 0 for Inactive, 1 for Idle, 2 for Blowing Air.
help.activeState: Indicates whether the device or service is currently active or inactive. Typically: 0 for Inactive, 1 for Active.
help.homekitGroup: Grouping same homekit accessories into one single panel
help.setupId: Setup ID used for pairing using QR Code. Alphanumeric code of length 4.
help.homekitPin: Defines pin, used for pairing, format: ###-##-###.
